ComicInfo.Summary: Suspended cop Deanna Ransome is "down" in the criminal underworld on a mission to infiltrate the city's most notorious narcotics gang and retrieve?or kill?the cop who descended before her and went native. But as she inches closer to drug kingpin Nick River, will she be able to make the right choice when the time comes? Find out in this fast-paced and blood-soaked crime noir thriller from award-winning Warren Ellis!
ComicInfo.Title: Down
